name: Lake Abyss
description:
DISCLAIMER

This is my attempt at a horror game, and as such, may contain content not suitable for some. (No blood or gore, just possible spooks)

For the best experience, I recommend downloading and playing.

Find the lost research, and make your way back up to where you started!

Controls

  1. WASD or Arrow keys to move
  2. E to interact when prompted (such as with seaweed)
  3. Left Shift to expend more oxygen, but move faster.
  4. Press R to restart the level, or to skip the introduction.
  5. If downloaded, press ESC to quit the game.
